buildCommand: curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/leanprover/elan/master/elan-init.sh -sSf | sh -s -- -y && export PATH="$HOME/.elan/bin:$PATH" && cd lean4game && npm ci && cd ../RealAnalysisGame && elan default $(cat lean-toolchain 2>/dev/null || echo "leanprover/lean4:stable") && lake build && cd ../lean4game && npm run build_relay && npm run build_client
